title: Regulation (EEC) No 949/75 of the Commission of 11 April 1975 amending Regulation (EEC) No 315/68 as regards the quality standards for lilium bulbs
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 949/75 OF THE COMMISSION  of 11 April 1975  amending Regulation (EEC) No 315/68 as regards the quality standards for lilium bulbs
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the table appearing in Section III of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 315/68, the entries relating to lilium bulbs are replaced by the text of the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 April 1975.
For the Commission
P.J. LARDINOIS
Member of the Commission  (1)OJ No L 55, 2.3.1968, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 71, 21.3.1968, p. 1. (3)OJ No L 181, 4.7.1973, p. 12.
ANNEX
